contentItems.content: As a natural introvert, it feels really good when someone else texts me first.
My neighbors are so friendly that I'm sitting in my car waiting for them to go inside so I don't have to talk to them.
I value my personal space & privacy and I’d appreciate it if you did, too. (Also, I’m super grumpy today.)
I had to answer the door earlier I’m done for the day
One time I talked to someone for twenty minutes so now I know how exhausted someone feels after running a marathon.
Just listed my wife as my emergency contact and added the note “please text, she doesn’t answer calls.”
I’ve met a lot of people in my life and let me tell you, we’re all a bit much.
